statements: SELECT * FROM patient_reports ORDER BY patient_id DESC;
SELECT patient_name, treatment_outcomes FROM patient_reports WHERE patient_id = 5;
SELECT * FROM patient_reports WHERE patient_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT patient_name AS Name, progress_notes AS Notes FROM patient_reports WHERE patient_name LIKE 'J%';
SELECT patient_id, progress_notes FROM patient_reports ORDER BY patient_name ASC, patient_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM patient_reports WHERE patient_id = 1;
SELECT patient_name, progress_notes FROM patient_reports WHERE patient_id = 3;
SELECT patient_name, treatment_outcomes FROM patient_reports WHERE patient_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM patient_reports WHERE patient_name LIKE '%John%';
SELECT patient_name, progress_notes, treatment_outcomes FROM patient_reports WHERE patient_id IN (4, 5);
SELECT * FROM patients WHERE age > 30;
SELECT patient_name, age FROM patients WHERE gender='Female';
SELECT patient_name, treatment_start_date FROM patients ORDER BY treatment_start_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM progress_reports WHERE report_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-28';
SELECT patient_name, symptoms, treatment_response FROM patients JOIN progress_reports ON patients.patient_id = progress_reports.patient_id;
SELECT * FROM patients WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY patient_name ASC
SELECT patient_name, gender FROM patients WHERE gender = 'Male' ORDER BY age DESC
SELECT patient_name, age, treatment_start_date FROM patients WHERE age < 25 ORDER BY treatment_start_date DESC
SELECT p.patient_name, pr.report_date, pr.symptoms FROM patients p INNER JOIN progress_reports pr ON p.patient_id = pr.patient_id WHERE pr.symptoms LIKE '%fever%' ORDER BY pr.report_date ASC
SELECT * FROM patients p LEFT JOIN progress_reports pr ON p.patient_id = pr.patient_id WHERE pr.report_id IS NULL
SELECT * FROM Patients;
SELECT name, date_of_birth FROM Patients WHERE gender = 'Male' ORDER BY date_of_birth DESC;
SELECT id, name, diagnosis FROM Patients WHERE diagnosis IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM Treatments WHERE treatment_cost > 1000 ORDER BY treatment_cost ASC;
SELECT report_id, therapist_notes FROM ProgressReports WHERE progress_status = 'Completed';
SELECT * FROM Patients WHERE id = 1;
SELECT name, date_of_birth, address FROM Patients WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT * FROM Treatments WHERE treatment_cost > 1000 ORDER BY treatment_date DESC;
SELECT Patients.name, ProgressReports.report_date, ProgressReports.progress_status FROM Patients JOIN ProgressReports ON Patients.id = ProgressReports.patient_id WHERE Patients.gender = 'Female';

SELECT ProgressReports.therapist_notes, Patients.name FROM ProgressReports JOIN Patients ON ProgressReports.patient_id = Patients.id WHERE ProgressReports.progress_status = 'Improving' ORDER BY report_date ASC;
SELECT patient_name, age, gender FROM Patients WHERE age > 50;
SELECT treatment_name, cost FROM Treatments WHERE cost > 1000;
SELECT progress_description, progress_date FROM Progress WHERE progress_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT outcome_description, outcome_date FROM Outcomes WHERE outcome_date < '2022-09-01';

SELECT patient_name, treatment_name, progress_description, outcome_description FROM Patients p JOIN Progress pr ON p.patient_id = pr.patient_id JOIN Outcomes o ON p.patient_id = o.patient_id JOIN Treatments t ON pr.treatment_id = t.treatment_id;
SELECT * FROM Patients WHERE age > 50 ORDER BY patient_name ASC;
SELECT treatment_name, cost FROM Treatments WHERE duration >= 10 ORDER BY cost DESC;
SELECT patient_name, treatment_name, progress_description FROM Patients p INNER JOIN Progress pr ON p.patient_id = pr.patient_id WHERE pr.progress_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT patient_id, treatment_name, outcome_description FROM Outcomes o INNER JOIN Treatments t ON o.treatment_id = t.treatment_id WHERE patient_id = 10;
SELECT DISTINCT gender FROM Patients WHERE age BETWEEN 18 AND 30 ORDER BY gender DESC;
SELECT * FROM patients;
SELECT patient_name, diagnosis, date_of_birth FROM patients ORDER BY diagnosis DESC;
SELECT patient_name, gender, date_of_birth FROM patients WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT * FROM progress_reports WHERE report_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT study_name, start_date, end_date FROM research_studies WHERE lead_researcher = 'Dr. Smith';
SELECT * FROM patients ORDER BY patient_id DESC;
SELECT patient_name, gender, diagnosis FROM patients WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT patient_name, date_of_birth, diagnosis FROM patients ORDER BY date_of_birth ASC;
SELECT p.patient_name, t.treatment_name, pr.progress_description FROM patients p JOIN treatments t ON p.patient_id = t.patient_id JOIN progress_reports pr ON t.patient_id = pr.patient_id;
SELECT r.study_name, r.lead_researcher, ar.analysis_results FROM research_studies r LEFT JOIN analysis_results ar ON r.study_id = ar.report_id;
